current.name: Ugly Holiday Sweater
current.requirement: During (19.12.2019 - 06.01.2020), complete 10 matchmaking (PvP and/or Firefight) matches on snowy maps.

current.name: Put a Ring On It
current.requirement: During (12.02.2020 - 18.2.2020), complete 10 matches in any 2v2 playlist (ranked or social) or Firefight. OR, During (13.02.2019 - 01.03.2019), complete 10 matches of Multi Team in Social Games or play 3 unique Co-op missions. OR, launch MCC during (13.02.2021 - 15.02.2021)

current.name: YapYap THE DESTROYER
current.requirement: During (27.05.2020 - 10.06.2020), complete seven Social matches within the playlist “The Yappening” on Halo 2 Classic multiplayer (4v4). OR, During (03.04.2019) - (24.04.2019), complete seven Social matches within the playlist Category “The Yappening” (4v4 and/or 8v8)

current.name: Shut Your Yap
current.requirement: During (27.05.2020 - 10.06.2020), headshot 150 Grunts in Campaign, Firefight, or Spartan Ops. OR, During (03.04.2019) - (24.04.2019), headshot 250 Grunts on Heroic or higher in Campaign or Spartan Ops. (You do not need to complete the missions for the headshots to count)

current.name: Know Your Roots
current.requirement: Win a giveaway hosted by a HCS Grassroots partner. OR, be a tournament organizer or content creator partnered with the HCS Grassroots Program. OR, match against Halo creators on various playdates.

current.name: Make it a Venti
current.requirement: Participate in a Microsoft Store Halo tournament (Currently US only)

current.name: Legacy Insider
current.requirement: Complete 5 or more matches during the networking stress test on (05.10.2019) during the Xbox One Halo: Reach flight.

current.name: Legendary Insider
current.requirement: Complete 12 or more matches during the networking stress test on (05.10.2019) during the Xbox One Halo: Reach flight.

current.name: Reclamation
current.requirement: Be a Reclaimer (A select group of community members and insiders specially selected for this role). Halo influencers like YouTubers, Streamers and Halo Discord moderators. Must be referred by an existing member or selected by 343i directly. These players are called in for Ring 1 testing once 343i has completed their Ring 0 testing of a flight or update.

current.name: Community MVP
current.requirement: Be in the top 10 of most played matches during the networking stress test on (05.10.2019) during the Xbox One Halo: Reach flight. (A very special and rare nameplate)

current.name: HCS Pro
current.requirement: Be a HCS Pro, OR, Be in the top 8 in any of the MCC Pro Series tournament.

current.name: HCS Grassroots
current.requirement: Win a giveaway hosted by a HCS Grassroots partner. OR, be a tournament organizer or content creator partnered with the HCS Grassroots Program. OR, match against Halo creators on various playdates. (This nameplate also grants you a BR skin in Halo 5)

current.name: Fireteam Raven
current.requirement: Link your Xbox Live account to the arcade machine when playing at a location with Halo

current.name: 343 Fire
current.requirement: Get featured by 343 Industries in a Community Spotlight. If you get featured, you need to fill out a form at the bottom of the Spotlight page that you got featured on to be eligible to recieve the 343 Fire nameplate.

current.name: 343 Ice
current.requirement: Play with a member of 343 Industries in the match during an official event. OR, were one of the 266 Insiders who completed 12 or more matches in a Insider official session during the networking stress test on (15.12.2018) - (16.12.2018) and got the 343 Ice nameplate as a compensation for the Ugly Holiday Sweater not being delivered to them.

current.name: Cartographer
current.requirement: Get your content (forge maps) featured into matchmaking rotation by 343i.

current.name: Spirit of Fire
current.requirement: Complete the campaign for Halo Wars: Definitive Edition (Xbox/Windows 10 version only)

current.name: Banished
current.requirement: Complete the campaign for Halo Wars 2

current.name: Flood

OR, get featured in #HaloCliptrocity, #HaloGameSense, or the #ClipShowdown on Twitter.
